en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
tk:
Daş-töwereginden ýüzlerçe gözlegçä goşulyň
           tarapyndan “Açyk görnüş” jemgyýetiniň bir bölegi bolan dünýä
           derňemek, paýlaşmak, gaýtadan işlemek we kesgitlemek
           olaryň Raman we IR spektrleri. Bu hyzmatlar hyzmatdaşlarymyz üçin mugt we açyk çeşme:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
tk:
Gysgaça: Gurallary ulanmak üçin csv, asp, jdx, spc ýa-da spa faýly ýüklemek faýly goýmasyna ýükläň.
                                  Csv bolsa, bir sütüne 'tolkun' (1 / sm birliklerde), beýlekisine 'intensiwlik' diýilýär.
                                  SG süzgüçini ulanyp maglumatlaryňyzy tekizläp bilersiňiz, iModPolyFit-iň polinomial tertibini ulanyp maglumatlaryňyzy düzedip bilersiňiz we oýun üçin tolkun uzynlygyny çäklendirip bilersiňiz.
                                  Netije içerki Raman ýa-da FTIR spektrli kitaphana bilen deňeşdiriler. Iň güýçli 1000 oýun siziň bilen bilelikde
                                  ýüklenen ýa-da gaýtadan işlenen maglumatlar interaktiw sýu plotetde we tablisada görkeziler. Has giňişleýin maglumat üçin aşakdaky düwmä basyň
                                  ýa-da jikme-jik görkezme wideosyna tomaşa ediň.

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
tk:
Salgy spektrleri açyk giriş çeşmelerinden alyndy
           Onlaýn, deň-duşlar neşirleri we kärhana sadakalaryny gözden geçirdiler. Geljekde
           gural üçin ýüklenen spektrler salgylanma goşular
           hasam gowulaşdyrmak üçin kitaphana.

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
tk:
Spektrleri paýlaşmak üçin faýl ýüklemek goýmasyna bir faýl ýükläň. Saýlan bolsaňyz, spektrleriňiziň bir nusgasy Bileleşige iberiler
           Açyk ylym çarçuwasyndaky maglumatlar ammary. Goşmaça metadata goşmak üçin,
           elýeterli metadata meýdanlaryny dolduryň we “Maglumatlary paýlaşyň” düwmesine basyň. The
           Jogaplaryňyz bilen birlikde ýüklän spektr faýlyňyz göçüriler
           aşakdaky baglanyşykdaky “Metadata” bukjasyna. Paýlaşylan maglumatlaryň hemmesi saklanýar
           Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
tk:
Muny tassyklamak üçin bu guraldaky ähli parametrler synagdan geçirilýär
           gural mümkin boldugyça gowy işleýär we iň oňat deslapky kesgitlemäni kesgitleýär
           ulanmagyň parametrleri. Häzirki tassyklama işimiz düzedişi öz içine alýar
           spektrleri barlamak üçin salgylanma kitaphanalarynda köpeldilen ýazgylar
           spektral kitaphanada bolmadyk we deslapky görnüşi üpjün edýän metadata
           parametrleri ilkinji oýunda 80% -den gowrak takyklygy üpjün edýär.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
tk: Täzelenmeler, aýratynlyk talaplary we ýalňyş hasabatlary

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
tk: Kodumyzdaky wersiýa gözegçiligini ulanyp, ähli täzelenmeleri yzarlaýarys. Aýratynlyklary sorap bolýar we GitHub-da habar berilýär.

tk: Twitterde @OpenSpecy-de yzarlaň. Poçta sanawyna goşmak üçin wincowger@gmail.com e-poçta iberiň.

tk: Spektral derňew üçin mugt iş stoly programmasy we maglumat bazalaryna baglanyşyklar.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
tk:
Isleseňiz, ýüklenen spektrleriňizi we sazlamalaryňyzy spektroskopiýa jemgyýeti bilen paýlaşýarys.
           Düzgüne görä, Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0) laýyklykda ähli maglumatlar ygtyýarlandyrylar.
           Uploadüklenen spektrler şu ýerde peýda bolar: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
tk:
Raman ýa-da FTIR spektr faýllaryny csv, jdx, spc ýa-da spa görnüşinde ýükläň. Csv faýly makul bilner. Eger csv bolsa, faýlda (1 / sm) birliklerde “tolkun” diýlip ýazylan bir sütün, sorujy birliklerde “intensiwlik” diýen sütün bolmaly.
            Jdx, spc, spa ýa-da 0 bolsa, faýl (1 / sm) tolkunly ýekeje siňdiriş spektri bolmaly. Bu faýllar elmydama birkemsiz işlemez, sebäbi başga bir programma üpjünçiliginde iki gezek barlaň.
            Raman spektrini göçürip almak üçin 'Synag maglumatlary' düwmesine basyň.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
tk:
Uploadüklenen spektr sorujy birliklerde bolmasa,
           öwürmek üçin birlikleri kesgitlemek üçin bu girişden peýdalanyň. “Specy” açyp bilersiňiz
           şöhlelendiriş ýa-da geçiriş spektrini ulanyp, Absorbsiýa bölümlerine sazlaň
           ýüklemek faýly goýmasynda aşak düşýär. Öňki bellikleriň hemmesi
           maglumatlaryň sorujy birlikdigini göz öňünde tutuň, şonuň üçin etmeli
           zerur bolsa dowam etdirmezden ozal düzediş. Geçiriş sazlamasy
           ulgam üçin düzetmeýän log10 (1 / T) hasaplamasyny ulanýar
           we bölejikleriň aýratynlyklary. Yzygiderliligi sazlamak
           Kubelka-Munk deňlemesi (1-R) 2 / (2 * R). Oýlanmagy göz öňünde tutýarys
           1-100-den göterim hökmünde formatlanýar we ilki bilen 100-e bölmek bilen intensiwligi düzediň
           deňlemäniň garaşylýan görnüşine laýyk geler ýaly.
           Hiç biri saýlanmasa, “Open Specy” ýüklenen maglumatlaryň bardygyny çaklaýar
           siňdiriş spektri.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
tk: Synag we csv faýllarynyň nähili formatlanmalydygyna düşünmek üçin gurallara ýükläp boljak nusga spektr.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
tk:
Islendik ýüklenen spektri we metadatalary spektroskopiýa jemgyýeti bilen paýlaşýarys, eger bu ýerdäki meta-maglumaty doldursaňyz we paýlaşsaňyz.
           Uploadüklenen spektrler we metadata şu ýerde peýda bolar: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
tk: Gaýtadan işlenýän spektrleri tekiz we göçürip alyň

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
tk: Käbir ulanyjylar gaýtadan işlenen spektriň göçürmesini saklamak isläp bilerler. Bu düwme gaýtadan işlenen spektri csv faýly hökmünde göçürip alýar.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
tk: Bu has ýumşak, signalyň maglumatlaryň ses derejesine bolan gatnaşygyny güýçlendirip biler we 12 işleýän maglumat nokady we görkezilen polinomial bilen Savitzky-Golay süzgüçini ulanýar.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
tk: Bu esasy düzediş düzgüniniň esasy düzediş üçin iki warianty bar, 1) spektriň ähli sebtine polinomial laýyklygy ulanyp, spektriň binýadyny yzygiderli tapmak üçin polinomial imodpolyfit prosedurasy. 2) sýu plotetdäki çyzyk guralynyň kömegi bilen el bilen çyzyklar çekilip bilner we dogry düwme esasy setirleri aýyrmak üçin setirleri ulanar.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
tk: Spektral diapazony çäklendirmek, pikleriň ýok ýerlerini aýryp, laýyklygy gowulaşdyryp biler

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
tk: Bu saýlaw, FTIR ýa-da Raman gabat gelýän kitaphananyň ulanylandygyny kesgitlär. Edüklenen spektr görnüşini saýlaň.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
tk: Bu saýlaw, ýüklenen (gaýtadan işlenmedik) spektriň ýa-da gaýtadan işleýiş goýmasynyň kömegi bilen gaýtadan işlenen spektriň spektr oýnunda ulanylýandygyny kesgitlär.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
tk: Bu saýlaw, gabat gelýän kitaphananyňyzyň doly spektrden ýa-da diňe spektr piklerinden ybaratdygyny kesgitlär.
